args: import json, sys, httpx, asyncio; exec('''async def main(): import os; api_url = os.getenv(\"KNOWLEDGEHUB_API_URL\", \"http://192.168.1.25:3000\"); project_path = os.getenv(\"KNOWLEDGEHUB_PROJECT_PATH\", \"/opt/projects/knowledgehub\"); tools = [{\"name\": \"activate_project\", \"description\": \"Activate project for analysis\", \"inputSchema\": {\"type\": \"object\", \"properties\": {\"project_path\": {\"type\": \"string\"}}, \"required\": [\"project_path\"]}}, {\"name\": \"get_symbols\", \"description\": \"Get project symbols\", \"inputSchema\": {\"type\": \"object\", \"properties\": {\"project_path\": {\"type\": \"string\"}}, \"required\": [\"project_path\"]}}, {\"name\": \"find_symbol\", \"description\": \"Find specific symbol\", \"inputSchema\": {\"type\": \"object\", \"properties\": {\"project_path\": {\"type\": \"string\"}, \"name_path\": {\"type\": \"string\"}}, \"required\": [\"project_path\", \"name_path\"]}}]; print(json.dumps({\"tools\": tools})); asyncio.run(main())''')
